item.title: How to connect to the internet with wpa supplicant
item.description: When installing a distro with a minimal installation, you have to connect to the internet via command line. I’m gonna show you how to connect with the simplest tool, without all those unecessarily programs, like NetworkManager, Connman, and other bloat things. After all, we are using a minimal installation, we don’t want packages we don’t need. You will need these packages: wpa_supplicant dhcpcd In some distributions they are installed by default.
